statements: SELECT * FROM consensus_mechanism
SELECT consensus_algorithm, vote_timestamp FROM consensus_mechanism ORDER BY block_number DESC
SELECT node_id, consensus_algorithm, block_number FROM consensus_mechanism WHERE consensus_algorithm = 'PBFT'
SELECT * FROM consensus_mechanism WHERE vote_timestamp >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00'
SELECT node_id, block_number FROM consensus_mechanism ORDER BY block_number ASC, consensus_algorithm
SELECT * FROM consensus_mechanism WHERE block_number > 100 ORDER BY vote_timestamp DESC;
SELECT node_id, consensus_algorithm FROM consensus_mechanism WHERE consensus_algorithm = 'PBFT';
SELECT DISTINCT consensus_algorithm FROM consensus_mechanism ORDER BY consensus_algorithm ASC;
SELECT node_id, block_number FROM consensus_mechanism WHERE block_number BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT node_id, vote_timestamp FROM consensus_mechanism WHERE vote_timestamp >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY vote_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM consensus_mechanism ORDER BY round_number ASC
SELECT id, node_id, is_leader FROM consensus_mechanism WHERE is_leader = TRUE
SELECT node_id FROM consensus_mechanism WHERE round_number = 10
SELECT * FROM transaction_validation WHERE is_valid = FALSE
SELECT MAX(round_number) FROM consensus_mechanism
SELECT id, node_id, round_number, is_leader FROM consensus_mechanism WHERE round_number > 10 ORDER BY round_number DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, node_id, round_number, is_leader FROM consensus_mechanism WHERE is_leader = true;
SELECT id, transaction_id, signature, is_valid FROM transaction_validation WHERE is_valid = false;
SELECT * FROM consensus_mechanism WHERE node_id = '14d177f1-3ddc-4b7b-8724-5c7b573fb323';
SELECT id, transaction_id, signature, is_valid FROM transaction_validation WHERE is_valid = true ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM consensus_mechanism ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT algorithm, block_size FROM consensus_mechanism WHERE algorithm='Proof of Work';
SELECT id, from_address, to_address, amount FROM transactions WHERE timestamp > '2021-01-01';
SELECT validator_address, validation_result FROM validation WHERE validated_tx_id = 1001;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_validations FROM validation WHERE validation_result = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM consensus_mechanism ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT algorithm, block_size FROM consensus_mechanism WHERE block_size > 100;
SELECT algorithm FROM consensus_mechanism WHERE algorithm LIKE 'Proof%';
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT from_address, to_address, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM consensus_mechanism;
SELECT node_address, consensus_algorithm FROM consensus_mechanism WHERE id = 1;
SELECT sender_address, amount, receiver_address FROM transaction_pool WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT block_id, block_hash, previous_block_id FROM block_chain ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT validation_result FROM validation_log WHERE validator_node_id = 3 AND block_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM consensus_mechanism
SELECT id, consensus_algorithm FROM consensus_mechanism ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT node_id, node_address FROM consensus_mechanism WHERE node_id = 5
SELECT * FROM transaction_pool WHERE amount > 1000
SELECT block_id, block_hash, timestamp FROM block_chain ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM Validators WHERE validation_power > 50;
SELECT validator_name, public_key FROM Validators ORDER BY validator_name ASC;
SELECT transaction_hash, sender_address, receiver_address FROM Transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM ConsensusMechanism WHERE mechanism_type = 'PoS';
SELECT block_number, block_hash, timestamp FROM Blocks WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY block_number ASC;
SELECT * FROM ConsensusMechanism;
SELECT validator_name, public_key FROM Validators ORDER BY validation_power DESC;
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM Transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT block_number, timestamp FROM Blocks WHERE block_number BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT SUM(reward_amount) AS total_rewards, receiver_address FROM Rewards GROUP BY receiver_address HAVING total_rewards > 5000;
